Menang Mutlak, Iwan Bule Pimpin PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 22:46 by Arif Budi Kristanto
JAKARTA, (PR).- Komisaris Jenderal Polisi Mochamad Iriawan secara resmi terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023 berdasarkan hasil pemilihan pada Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI yang digelar di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu, 2 November 2019. Dalam pemungutan suara yang dilakukan 86 voters PSSI untuk 11 kandidat ketua, Iriawan unggul mutlak dengan raihan 82 suara.
Kongres dengan agenda utama pemilihan Ketua Umum, Wakil Ketua Umum, dan12  Anggota Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI untuk periode 2019-2023 diikuti 86 pemilik suara yang terdiri dari 34 perwakilan Asosiasi Provinsi, 18 klub Liga 1, 16 klub Liga 2, 16 klub Liga 3 hasil dari kompetisi 2018, Federasi Futsal Indonesia, dan Asosiasi Sepak Bola Putri. Selain 82 voter yang memilih Iwan, tiga suara dianggap tidak sah dan satu voters tidak ikut memilih alias walk out yakni perwakilan Persis Solo.
"Hasil kongres hari ini bukan soal kemenangan saya, melainkan kemenangan insan sepak bola Indonesia. Kita semua tentunya bertekad untuk memajukan sepak bola yang amat kita cintai ini. Kita juga bersyukur bahwa kita menjadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 pada 2021 nanti dan harus kita persiapkan maksimal dari sekarang," ujar Iwan kepada wartawan di sela-sela kongres.
Setelah terpilih, Iwan mengatakan sudah mendapatkan telefon ucapan selamat dari Presiden FIFA, AFC, hingga dari AFF. 
"Intinya presiden FIFA mengucapkan selamat atas terpilihnya saya. Beliau berharap sepak bola Indonesia bisa lebih maju di bawah pimpinan saya dan beliau bilang sudah bertemu dengan Presiden Jokowi. Dari AFC dan AFF juga sudah (telefon)," kata Iwan yang merupakan Sekretaris Utama Lembaga Ketahanan Nasional itu.
Dia mengatakan fokus terdekatnya pascaterpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI adalah mencurahkan perhatian lebih kepada tim nasional untuk ajang SEA Games 2019 di Filipina. 
"Ada target, harus dipacu, mudah-mudahan bisa ke final, syukur kalau menang. Yang pasti kita harus beri perhatian besar ke tim SEA Games ini," kata Iwan.
Penentuan pelatih tim nasional juga menjadi prioritas terdekat Iwan. Dia mengatakan, PSSI akan segera mengkaji sejumlah nama untuk kemudian ditentukan menjadi pelatih tim Garuda.
"Beri saya waktu satu dua hari ini untuk mendalami. Aspirasi soal Luis Milla, ada juga eks pelatih Korea, ada beberapa pelatih kita (Indonesia) juga. Akan kita pertimbangkan dari berbagai aspek, belum tentu (pelatih) asing," kata mantan Kapolda Metro Jaya tersebut.
Dari 11 kandidat ketua umum PSSI yang sebelumnya sudah ditetapkan, hanya tersisa tiga kandidat saat pemilihan dimulai. Mereka adalah M. Iriawan, kemudian dua kandidat yang tidak mendapatkan suara, yakni Rahim Soekasah dan Arif Putra Wicaksono.



Diwarnai insiden 
Kongres sempat diwarnai sejumlah insiden. Enam kandidat memilih ke luar dari arena kongres setelah mencoba melakukan interupsi menjelang pemungutan suara. Lima di antaranya mengaku diusir dari arena Kongres PSSI. Mereka adalah Fary Djemy Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Yesayas Oktavianus, Sarman El-Hakim, dan Aven S. Hinelo. Kandidat lainnya, Benny Erwin juga akhirnya memilih meninggalkan ruangan.
"Kami hanya ingin interupsi untuk menyampaikan ke delegasi FIFA tentang beberaa hal yang kami anggap janggal. Tapi, kami malah dihalangi dan ditarik petugas security. Lalu Sekjen PSSI mengatakan 'Anda ke luar, kandidat yang tidak setuju silakan ke luar!'. Maka tidak ada gunanya lagi di dalam. Aspirasi, suara kami tidak didengar," kata Vijaya.
Insiden juga terjadi sebelum kongres dimulai. Mochamad Iriawan sempat beradu mulut dengan Vijaya Fitriyasa. Penyebabnya, Iwan yang tengah diwawancarai media sempat dihampiri oleh kandidat lainnya Vijaya Fitriyasa. Keduanya sempat bersalaman. Namun Iwan menolak berbicara lebih lanjut dengan Vijaya yang tampak ingin mengutarakan hal terkait kongres. Iriawan mendorong Vijaya dan memintanya menghargai sesi wawancaranya dengan media sebelum akhirnya Vijaya ditarik oleh pengawal pribadi Iwan.
Sementara itu, dua kandidat lainnya, yakni La Nyalla Mattalliti dan Bernhard Limbong sudah menyatakan menarik diri sebelum kongres digelar dengan alasan masing-masing.
Dalam memimpin PSSI empat tahun ke depan, Iriawan "Iwan Bule" akan dibantu oleh dua orang wakil ketua. Mereka adalah Cucu Soemantri dan Iwan Budianto. Keduanya resmi terpilih jadi Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI setelah unggul dalam pemilihan pada KLB tersebut.
Cucu dan Iwan Budianto menyisihkan empat calon waketum lainnya, yakni Djamal Aziz, Esti Puji Lestari, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Yesayas Oktavianus, dan Hinca Pandjaitan.
Dalam pemungutan suara, Cucu memperoleh suara terbanyak, yakni 81 suara diikuti Iwan Budianto dengan 74 suara. Perolehan suara keduanya jauh mengungguli Esti, Hasnur, dan Yesayas yang hanya mendapat dua suara. Sementara itu Djamal dan Hinca meraih satu suara dari 163 suara sah. Sebanyak 11 suara dinyatakan tidak sah.
Selain ketua  umum dan dua wakilnya, kongres juga menetapkan 12 anggota komite eksekutif PSSI hasil pemilihan para pemilik hak suara. 
Syarat untuk terpilih menjadi anggota exco adalah harus mendapatkan suara 50+1 dari 86 pemilik suara. Artinya, kandidat mesti mengantongi minimal 44 suara agar terpilih.
Ke-12 anggota exco terpilih adalah Dirk Soplanit (62 suara), Yoyok Sukawi (45 suara), Endri Erawan (44 suara), Juni Rahman (45), Haruna Soemitro (45) Hasnuryadi Sulaiman (44), Pieter Tanuri (52), Sonhadji (58), Ahmad Riyadh (55), Hasani Abdul Gani (49), Yunus Nusi (44), dan Vivin Cahyani (47). Tidak ada wakil dari Jawa Barat dalam susunan exco tersebut. Ketua Asprov PSSI Jabar Tommy Apriantono yang merupakan salah satu calon gagal meraih jumlah suara minimal.



Legitimasi FIFA
KLB PSSI dibuka secara resmi oleh Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Zainudin Amali didampingi Ketua Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Marciano Norman, Ketua Komite Olimpiade Indonesia (KOI) Raja Sapta Oktohari, dan perwakilan PSSI.
Kongres dihadiri dua delegasi FIFA, yakni Head of Member Association Governance Service Luca Nicola dan Development Manager Southeast and East Asia, Lavin Vignesh. Turut hadir tiga delegasi AFC, yakni Head of South Asia Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departemen Purushottam Kattel, Manager of Asean Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departement Nhodkeo Phawadee dan Secretary of AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Departement, Varankumar Sagaran.
Presiden FIFA Gianni Infantino turut memberikan sambutan melalui video pada awal kongres sekaligus menandakan legitimasi KLB PSSI tersebut di mata FIFA.
"Indonesia bukan hanya negara hebat, tapi juga sepak bola yang potensial. Kongres ini sangat penting dan pemilihan menjadi fondasi untuk melanjutkan apa yang sudah dilakukan karena telah banyak terjadi kemajuan positif. Perlu kerja sama semua pihak untuk sepak bola indonesia. Secara khusus, terima kasih kepada PSSI yang telah mengajukan menjadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 tahun 2021. Saya berharap kongres berlangsung baik," kata Infantino.
Sementara itu Menpora Zainudin menegaskan netralitas pemerintah yang tidak memihak salah satu kandidat ketua umum pada kongres itu. Dia mengatakan, pemerintah tidak akan mencampuri urusan internal cabang olah raga. Apalagi, PSSI bernaung di bawah statuta FIFA. 
"Masalah cabor diselesaikan oleh internal cabor dulu. Kalau tidak bisa ada KONI ada KOI. Jangan segala sesuatunya harus turun pemerintah," ujar Zainudin.
Menpora menambahkan, PSSI di bawah pimpinan ketua terpilih diharapkan dapat membawa kemajuan prestasi sepak bola Indonesia. Apalagi, kata Zainudin, Presiden RI menaruh perhatian besar pada pembinaan dan kemajuan prestasi sepak bola tanah air.
"Prestasi sepak bola ini harapan jutaan rakyat kita, jangan sampai dikecewakan. Presiden kita juga sangat concern pada sepak bola. Semoga PSSI bisa di bawah kepemimpinan ketua yang baru dengan kepengurusannya dapat membawa sepak bola kita lebih baik lagi" ujarnya.***

Absolute Winning, Iwan Bule Leads PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 22:46 by Arif Budi Kristanto
JAKARTA, (PR) .- Police Commissioner General Mochamad Iriawan was formally elected as Chairperson of PSSI for the period 2019-2023 based on the results of the election at the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) held at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday, November 2, 2019. In the voting carried out by 86 PSSI voters for 11 chairman candidates, Iriawan was in an absolute superior with 82 votes.
The Congress with the main agenda for the election of the Chairperson, Deputy Chairperson, and 12 Members of the PSSI Executive Committee (Exco) for the 2019-2023 period was followed by 86 voters consisting of 34 Provincial Association representatives, 18 League 1 clubs, 16 League 2 clubs, 16 League clubs 3 results from the 2018 competition, the Indonesian Futsal Federation, and the Women's Football Association. Apart from 82 voters who voted for Iwan, three votes were deemed invalid and one voter did not vote, aka walk out, namely the Persis Solo representative.
"The results of the congress today are not about my victory, but the victory of Indonesian footballers. We are all certainly determined to advance the football that we love so much. We are also grateful that we are hosting the U-20 World Cup in 2021 and we must prepare optimally from now on, "Iwan told reporters on the sidelines of the congress.
After being elected, Iwan said that he had received a congratulatory telephone from FIFA President, AFC, and from AFF.
"The point is that the FIFA president congratulates on my election. He hopes that Indonesian football can be more advanced under my leadership and he says he has met with President Jokowi. From the AFC and AFF it has also been (telephone)," said Iwan who is the Main Secretary of the Institute of Defense The national.
He said his closest focus after being elected as PSSI Chairperson was to pay more attention to the national team for the 2019 SEA Games in the Philippines.
"There is a target, we must drive it, hopefully we can reach the final, thankfully if we win. What is certain is that we must pay great attention to this SEA Games team," said Iwan.
The determination of the national team coach is also Iwan's closest priority. He said, PSSI would soon study a number of names and then be determined to be Garuda's team trainers.
"Give me a day or two to explore. Aspirations about Luis Milla, there are also former Korean coaches, there are some of our (Indonesian) trainers too. We will consider from various aspects, not necessarily foreign (coach)," said the former Metro Police Chief Jaya said.
Of the 11 PSSI general chairperson candidates previously set, only three were left when the election began. They were M. Iriawan, then two candidates who did not get votes, namely Rahim Soekasah and Arif Putra Wicaksono.



Colored incident
The congress was colored by a number of incidents. Six candidates chose to leave the congressional arena after trying to interrupt ahead of the vote. Five of them claimed to be expelled from the arena of the PSSI Congress. They are Fary Djemy Francis, Vijaya Fitriyasa, Yesayas Octavian, Sarman El-Hakim, and Aven S. Hinelo. Another candidate, Benny Erwin, also finally chose to leave the room.
"We just want an interruption to convey to FIFA delegates about what we consider odd. But, instead we were deterred and withdrawn by security officers. Then the Secretary General of PSSI said 'You are out, candidates who do not agree please go outside!'. Then there is no the point is again inside. Aspirations, our voices are not heard, "Vijaya said.
The incident also occurred before the congress began. Mochamad Iriawan had an argument with Vijaya Fitriyasa. The reason, Iwan who was being interviewed by the media was approached by another candidate Vijaya Fitriyasa. Both of them had a handshake. But Iwan refused to talk further with Vijaya who seemed to want to express matters related to the congress. Iriawan encouraged Vijaya and asked him to appreciate his interview session with the media before Vijaya was finally withdrawn by Iwan's personal bodyguard.
Meanwhile, two other candidates, namely La Nyalla Mattalliti and Bernhard Limbong, have said they have withdrawn before the congress was held on their respective grounds.
In leading PSSI for the next four years, Iriawan "Iwan Bule" will be assisted by two deputy chairmen. They are Cucu Soemantri and Iwan Budianto. Both were officially elected as Deputy Chairmen of PSSI after winning the election at the KLB.
Cucu and Iwan Budianto set aside four other candidates for the Waketum, namely Djamal Aziz, Esti Puji Lestari, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Yesayas Oktavianus, and Hinca Pandjaitan.
In the vote, Cucu received the most votes, 81 votes followed by Iwan Budianto with 74 votes. Both votes far surpass Esti, Hasnur, and Yesayas who only got two votes. Meanwhile Djamal and Hinca won one vote out of 163 legitimate votes. A total of 11 votes were declared invalid.
In addition to the general chairman and two of his deputies, the congress also appointed 12 PSSI executive committee members as a result of the election of voting rights holders.
The requirement to be elected as an EXCO member is to get 50 + 1 votes from 86 voters. That is, candidates must have at least 44 votes to be elected.
The 12 exco members elected were Dirk Soplanit (62 votes), Yoyok Sukawi (45 votes), Endri Erawan (44 votes), Juni Rahman (45), Haruna Soemitro (45) Hasnuryadi Sulaiman (44), Pieter Tanuri (52) , Sonhadji (58), Ahmad Riyadh (55), Hasani Abdul Gani (49), Yunus Nusi (44), and Vivin Cahyani (47). There was no representative from West Java in the composition of the exco. West Java PSSI Asprov Chair Tommy Apriantono who is one of the candidates failed to win the minimum number of votes.



FIFA legitimacy
PSSI KLB was officially opened by the Minister of Youth and Sports Zainudin Amali accompanied by Chairman of the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI) Marciano Norman, Chair of the Indonesian Olympic Committee (KOI) Raja Sapta Oktohari, and representatives of PSSI.
The congress was attended by two FIFA delegations, namely the Head of Members of the Governance Service Association Luca Nicola and Southeast and East Asia Development Manager Lavin Vignesh. Also present were three AFC delegates, namely the Head of South Asia Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department Purushottam Kattel, Manager of Asean Unit AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department Nhodkeo Phawadee and Secretary of AFC Member Association and Regional Associations Department, Varankumar Sagaran.
FIFA President Gianni Infantino also gave a speech through the video at the beginning of the congress while indicating the legitimacy of the PSSI KLB in FIFA's eyes.
"Indonesia is not only a great country, but also a potential football. This Congress is very important and the election is the foundation to continue what has been done because there has been a lot of positive progress. It needs cooperation from all parties for Indonesian football. Specifically, thank you "To PSSI who have proposed to host the U21 World Cup in 2021. I hope the congress will go well," Infantino said.
Meanwhile, Menpora Zainudin stressed the neutrality of the government which did not favor one of the candidates for the chairman of the congress. He said the government would not interfere in the internal affairs of the sports branch. Moreover, PSSI is under the FIFA statute.
"The sports problem is solved by the internal sports first. If there is no KONI, there will be KOI. Do not let everything have to go down by the government," said Zainudin.
The Menpora added, PSSI under the leadership of the elected chairman is expected to bring progress in the achievements of Indonesian football. Moreover, said Zainudin, the President of Indonesia paid great attention to the development and progress of the country's soccer achievements.
"This football achievement is the hope of millions of our people, not to be disappointed. Our president is also very concerned about football. Hopefully PSSI can be under the leadership of the new chairman with his management to bring our football even better," he said. ***
